properties.description: Enter the object title. Please use appropriate Title Case.
properties.title: Title

properties.description: Enter alternative titles for the object.
properties.title: Alternative Title(s)

properties.description: Select YES if this object is to be open for transcription by others.
properties.title: Transcribable?

properties.description: Please use this space to write a concise abstract of the work.
properties.title: Abstract

properties.description: Use this space to enter private (admin) comments that will NOT be visible to patrons. Additional comments can be added by opening new comment fields.
properties.title: Comments

properties.description: Use this space to enter public notes that may be visible to patrons. Additional notes can be added by opening new note tabs.
properties.title: Notes

properties.description: Enter provenance of the object. Note that this field is kept private and will NOT be visible to patrons.
properties.title: Provenance (Private)

properties.description: Enter provenance information that will remain PRIVATE.
Enter provenance of the object. Note that this field is PUBLIC and may be visible to patrons.
properties.title: Provenance (Public)

properties.description: Enter provenance information that will be visible to the PUBLIC.

properties.default_value: Copyright to this work is held by the author(s), in accordance with United States copyright law (USC 17). Readers of this work have certain rights as defined by the law, including but not limited to fair use (17 USC 107 et seq.).
properties.title: Copyright Information

options.index: Office, Department, Concentration or Program (Supporting host)
options.author: Author

properties.description: Enter the creation date for this work in the form: YYYY-MM-DD.
properties.title: Created

properties.description: Enter the copyright dates. Note that each field should contain a single date. Multiple copyrights should be entered by adding additional tabs.
properties.title: Copyright Date

properties.description: Enter the date of issue or publication.
properties.title: Issued

properties.description: Enter edition numbers or dates. Note that each field should contain a single number or date. Multiple editions should be entered by adding additional tabs.
properties.title: Edition(s)

properties.description: Grinnell College is the default publisher. Change or add others as needed.
properties.title: Publisher

properties.description: Grinnell College is the default publisher. Change or add as needed.
